label: 氏の長者
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: A status conferred by the court on a leading member of a clan. The post carried with it responsibility for religious observances in honor of the clan god, administration of clan shrines, supervision of the clan's lay affairs, and the annual recommendation of clan members for promotion from sixth to fifth rank.
